website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its Bluetooth functionality and natural wood finish.
pros: With the right amp and speakers, this Bluetooth turntable can output fantastic sound
Includes USB and RCA outputs as well
A reliable beginner turntable at a reasonable price
cons: The stylus can be somewhat noisy
Bluetooth may struggle to connect to some devices

customer_reviews.title: No stars would be too many.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give no stars.Sound quality appalling like listening to music underwater I tried various ways of playing this including Sound bar and even bought a new Bluetooth speaker all with the same result listening to Elbow I thought Guy Garvey was snorkelling while singing it's obviously a case of appearance over substance.I would not recommend anyone who isn't tone deaf to buy this item it's a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: mr m evans

customer_reviews.title: Present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents anniversary. It arrived quickly on prime delivery, boxed carefully with no plastic packaging. The set up was simple and it looks really sleek. Had a few issues trying to pair it with the Bose speaker we have but it could be the speaker. We’ve followed all the instructions but still couldn’t get it to connect. Works perfectly fine with the AUX lead. Great quality, sleek, beautiful sound and a well received gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but very badly built, as soon as the table turns you get a mechanical humming noise this then carry’s over to your speackers Bluetooth and RCA plugged in plus same sound via the headphone jack. Returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Surround sound for new vinyls and old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as more gigs offering vinyls instead of CDs. I have hooked it up to my TV surround sound, which is great. Also, I like that I can record to laptop so I can bring music across to my phone and MP3 player. Tried Bluetooth speaker once; it was easy to set up but will only be used when listening in the bath, as surround sound is much better
customer_reviews.author: Eddie C

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly Bad!!
customer_reviews.text: Im sorry to say but this player is absolutely horrendous! It drags during playback, sounds watery, and worst of all, there is a VERY noticable hum! Almost like a feedback sound. The deck plate didnt sit totally level either. It was so very disappointing to say the least! I hate to write such a harsh review but it is a completely honest one.
customer_reviews.author: wayne hayhoe

customer_reviews.title: Great to play my vinyl again
customer_reviews.text: Order a different turntable on amazon which didn’t stream out via bluetooth and was also faulty. Returned and then ordered this one. Arrived very quick. Looks great. I can play via a bluetooth speaker or can use an aux lead and have played through my bose docking station. Love the wood look. Really really pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Superb value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy to set up and connect to Bluetooth speaker. Vinyl to digital works well, as split tracks, so able to add to iTunes and transfer individual songs into playlists, Only challenge I found was when there is a continuation of one song into another, or only a very small silence between tracks on an album (as it’s the silence that is used to split tracks), as the songs didnt automatically split. However, when this happened, I just lifted stylus manually to create a gap and split the tracks manually. For the price this is superb value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Will H

customer_reviews.title: Poor Bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed ok to begin with but only after half an hour the Bluetooth kept dropping in and out .. did all the usual checks as all my other Bluetooth devices work fine with my LG sound bar. Anyway its on its merry way back to Amazon. I wont be ordering a replacement. May have been one duff unit but i am not taking any chances.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Samuel Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Constant hum and dull audio.
customer_reviews.text: Constant hum when connected to Bluetooth. Audio is dull and lifeless even through quality speakers. There seem to be a lot of these in the Amazon warehouse so assume a lot get returned. There will soon be another one as it's on its way back.
customer_reviews.author: MR A WHITEHEAD

customer_reviews.title: The most disappointing present I have bought
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at Christmas and only using it fully now. Upon using it I’ve noticed that it is a ridiculously wobbly turntable, the audio quality is very distorted and there is a ridiculous amount of noise from the needle, you can hear it over the speaker in most normal listening situations.
customer_reviews.author: Dara F.

customer_reviews.title: This is supposed to be a three speed deck. You need to order another stylus to play 78s.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with no power supply unit. I nearly scrapped the whole thing when I realised that the deck is only a 7'' one. I expected a 10 or 12" turntable. The sound is thin compared with my 2 speed Sony deck. However, I checked reviews on similar units and this one still looks like the best 3 speed for the money. The wooden deck is just a veneer on MDF by the way.... cheap and somewhat cheerless. Im looking for a genuine old deck now.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J C Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and attractive item
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with my purchase. Looks attractive on my sideboard and works well. The sound quality is dependent upon the quality of the Bluetooth device you play it through
customer_reviews.author: wendywoo62

customer_reviews.title: good value for money
customer_reviews.text: bought to play ancient vinyl and works a treat. Very neat and smart looking and extremely easy to connect to smart TV with bluetooth. Good sound through the TV. Only downside is that you can't adjust the bass etc settings during playback but that's the TV's limited functions and not the record player's fault. volume and other controls easy to use. Haven't tried recording to computer yet. Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: anne L

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish, avoid
customer_reviews.text: A very cheap and lightweight record player not fit for purpose. The player arm is so light and poorly balanced that some bass heavy record parts, such as Billy Eilish, skip rather than play. The turntable is about the size of a 7 inch record, not enough traction for LPs leading to random speed changes. Avoid this, spend a bit more and get an actual record player rather than this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great record player.
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this record player. Bought for a Christmas present. Great quality good price. Great delivery service. Would of liked a bit more packaging around it for transit.
customer_reviews.author: JM Wybrow

customer_reviews.title: Would be fab but if worked all of the time.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 4/5 but wobbles and skips. When it plays well, it sounds great for the price so I’m hoping for a rapid refund/replacement to try again.
customer_reviews.author: joda1978

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed when this item arrived a few days earlier than expected delivery date. Connected to my Bluetooth system very easily. Sound quality ok, but could be better, but think that could be down to my Bluetooth system and not this item. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pd66qpr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and to connect to Bluetooth. Sounds through my Bluetooth speaker is good. Only issue I have is there is a lot of sound feedback through the arm if you don't shut the lid, but even then you can still hear it, makes it sound like there is a sound delay. Other than that it's pretty good. I have moved the player out of the room so it's not much of an issue anymore.
customer_reviews.author: L T

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup the bonus is it looks really nice and is great paired with my active edifier speakers I love that We got our vinyl out of storage and we are listening to it again
customer_reviews.author: jolees

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The fist one we ordered had defective Bluetooth, but the company changed it without any fuss and couldn’t have been more helpful. It’s a lovely player without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Mr IS Ferriby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and connects easily with my Bluetooth soundbar. Really good sound. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Brenchley-Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Returned for refund
customer_reviews.text: It did work but you could hear the sound being amplified in the deck. Listening at low volume was annoying
customer_reviews.author: RichV

customer_reviews.title: I have tried it with some old 60s albums and I am sure PM's voice then sounded little like it does now through this machine
customer_reviews.text: Mine seems to have a turntable speed problem. I have tried it with some old 60s albums and I am sure PM's voice then sounded little like it does now through this machine. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Allan Williams and Mrs Maureen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sorry ION you need to do better.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this record player as the plastic needle sounded awful. For the price I paid I would have expected at least a basic standard diamond needle, was not impressed at all. Sorry ION you need to do better.
customer_reviews.author: Davies Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound excellent solid quality build no complaints great price too.
customer_reviews.author: uberdrive

customer_reviews.title: produced good sound with a decent wireless speaker and it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, produced good sound with a decent wireless speaker and it seems well appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday...
customer_reviews.text: Nicest design I could find and is perfect for everyday vinyl listening - only downside is you have to use bluetooth to play via speakers and it needs to be in close range. I'd go for the one with built in speakers if I had the choice again but it doesnt look as nice.
customer_reviews.author: CHEADLE

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this record player
customer_reviews.text: We love this record player. Easy to use and really good sound for the price. Its compact and tidy so looks great! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: ApesandChrin

customer_reviews.title: Great product and the ability to have it play from ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and the ability to have it play from a Bluetooth speaker means that you are responsible for your own output... the impetus we needed to dust off our vinyls (and even go out and buy some more)... It looks great too, which helps.
customer_reviews.author: TopCat

customer_reviews.title: Plastic needle is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: The plastic needle its arrives with is beyond a waste of time it might aswell not come with a needle. If your buying buy a replacement needle aswell. Sounds like it damaged your records. Not very happy hoping the new needle solves the problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny sound not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo disapointed in this. I realise it might be a buget model, but was looking forward to putting a record on and relaxing. The sound is very tiny, and not pleasant (connected to expensive BT speakers). And the sound from the needle is so load it is distracting.
customer_reviews.author: ToysChestUK

customer_reviews.title: good bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: the bluetooth makes it perfect for small homes where you dont want to disturb others. only downside is the light needle that can be thrown off by an unseen hair, but overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean, crisp, easy and cheap what not to like
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean sound, easy to use. A very good effort in this price range plus cartridges aren't prohibitive to replace.
customer_reviews.author: pretty man

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth difficulties
customer_reviews.text: Really difficult to pair with blue tooth speakers, needed to plug in jack for it to then recognise a blue tooth speaker, just a hassle every time to use, can see it being un used very soon. Shame
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level record player
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift as we have one too. Great entry level record player and works with an Alexa or blue tooth speakers
customer_reviews.author: MISS A.

customer_reviews.title: Good sounds quality
customer_reviews.text: Really happy we can now play all the vinyls in the house! Sound quality is good (using a Bose wireless speaker)
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Lack of audio depth.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this record deck. The sound quality was very poor in my opinion, it lacked depth, with a total absence of bass. This lack of bass was either through an amp or via Bluetooth to my Bose QC35 headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Missing item
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use as there was no power adapter invluded
customer_reviews.author: Laval Nombreuse

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit love listening to my records. Do have issue with it picking up Bluetooth but there is a back to it And it looks great too Good purchase overall 😊
customer_reviews.author: R. A. James

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: excellent value for the price, looks good, sounds good, connected straight away to a bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it wireless Bluetooth record player directly to my bose speaker great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G Pilkington

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a Birthday present for my sister great quality looks great and sounds even better would have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Birthday present for my sister great quality looks great and sounds even better would have no hesitation in buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McInerney

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and don’t answer phone
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t know what the quality etc of the product is like as felt slip mat was missing. Continually tried to phone but no one answers and no answer service. Very diasppointing. Won’t be using them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First vinyl player and excellent in general when it comes to pairing its a headache in a modern home....
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable value - £100.00 in my local record shop.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection works fine. Sound quality not the best and feedback from needle head a little annoying if you are close. Not the best but for the money reasonable value.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: now enjoy all my vinyls on this great little player
customer_reviews.text: Initial Bluetooth pairing issue, but was soon rectified, now enjoy all my vinyls on this great little player!
customer_reviews.author: Demonic16

customer_reviews.title: You’ve got to be patient when connecting Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: You’ve got to be patient when connecting to Bluetooth apart from that its perfect kev
customer_reviews.author: kevin copeland

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a Christmas present - and very well received! We would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Saskia Bates

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it! Can’t wait for lazy sundays doing crosswords and listening to old records!! Blue tooth works easily and looks pretty 😊
customer_reviews.author: sally goff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and sound great via blue tooth ~ love it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Aroo

customer_reviews.title: Spot On
customer_reviews.text: Was after a low priced turntable that I could connect to bluetooth speakers. This was absolutely spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & connects to Bluetooth easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband, he loves it! Excellent quality & connects to Bluetooth easily.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: easy to pair with my BT speakers (as long as ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the box, easy to pair with my BT speakers (as long as iPhone BT turned off) sound quality is good. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Ok-ish... if you don't care about sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks OK and the sound quality is less than OK. the table wobbles a lot so, if you want to listen to jazz records or similiar, the sound gets distorted.... returned it thinking it was just a faulty product.. second turntable does the same.
customer_reviews.author: Ines Leitao

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Connects to any Bluetooth device? No it doesn’t!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Summerfield

customer_reviews.title: Ion bt deck
customer_reviews.text: Good piece of kit . Easy set up sounds good on bose blue tooth. Good for budget item 😆
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item mum loved this as her christmas gift can ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item mum loved this as her christmas gift can now listen to music visa her phone speedy delivery too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lovely sound. Goid size not too big or bulky. The natural wood effect goes with our furniture
customer_reviews.author: karen Bunting

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Was fine for first few months then sound started to reduce in quality. Completely unusable by October 18 only good for the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond O'Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats vinyl!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the revival of my vinyl. Easy to use. Plugged it into my Bose and off we go!!
customer_reviews.author: G man

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: As long as you connect it to a decent speaker it’s great! So simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: smashing fun. Did what it said on the box
customer_reviews.text: Glorious, smashing fun. Did what it said on the box, out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Sounded terrible. Pitch all over the place. Thought it may be a dudd but ordered a replacement and same problems.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good Vinyl player
customer_reviews.text: Love this one - has got the look we were looking for Easy to connect to bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Katrin Thora

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly
customer_reviews.text: It’s started playing the music really loud without it being connected to the the Bluetooth. Also it takes so long to connect to the Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ian White

customer_reviews.title: It has gone faulty by turning slowly on 33 and ...
customer_reviews.text: It has gone faulty by turning slowly on 33 and cant find out how to get repaired/ replaced as the Amazon site wont allow me!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TomGaffney

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with my LG soundbar so check compatibilty before you buy..
customer_reviews.author: Smiffy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good service and I’m happy with the product. Overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: Colie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and £10 cheaper than high st store
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to play my old vinyl again. A bit of nostalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel greaves

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Complete rubbish. Every record played on this record player skips. I bought this late September as a Christmas present so I can't return it even though it's completely unusable. Couldn't recommend ION products to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M.

customer_reviews.title: Good one!
customer_reviews.text: siple and easy vinyl palyer for LP fans who wants to play its old collections
customer_reviews.author: Aaslav

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic with AirPods too!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic record player which connects amazingly well to my AirPods!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wanted one of these for years, whats great is the aux works great with my freeview box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Look nice ,easy to use ,was a present which went down very well
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun but is not possible to use without Bluetooth speakers
customer_reviews.author: Melodie

customer_reviews.title: great quality sounds great
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time . great quality sounds great, connects easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much for the bluetooth streaming!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who has gone retro and started buying vinyl. Bought specifically because it could connect wirelessly to the sound system I bought him for his birthday. So well pissed off that the key function does not work! If it was not for the fact that we were able to set it up through the Aux on the stereo I would have sent it back. Does sound sweet though, deep rich sound the like of which I have not heard since ditching this format 15 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ade the shade

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth does not work
customer_reviews.text: 1st one would not connect to any Bluetooth devices at all, returned it to Amazon who sent a replacement however this was exactly the same tried connecting to mocreo speaker, Bose QC35 headphones, Denon amplifier, galaxy tab, Tesco husk etc with no success, Bluetooth just would not work, spoke to a guy in their technical assistance department, he said there was no reason it shouldn't connect and Amazon have possibly received a bad batch, I have now returned for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: LEE KNIGHT

customer_reviews.title: There WAS an adapter after all!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so the adapter fell out the box and slid under a chair so I APOLOGISE for the rant and previous poor rating. Been listening to Gilese Peterson for the past half hour and it's sounding fantastic! Connected to Bluetooth straight away and have had no other problems setting it up. Definitely would recommend to others wanting a reasonably priced product that looks good in a modern setting. Very excited to receive my record player today only to discover it had NO POWER ADAPTER! DO NOT BUY from this seller. Total joke.
customer_reviews.author: Laura LAD

customer_reviews.title: The wood effect base looks good and that's about it
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, it has a cheap and cheerful look to it. The wood effect base looks good and that's about it. I would have given it more stars if I could get the Bluetooth to work. It would not connect to my Bose wireless speaker or Denon amp, sent it back for a refund. I've found another for the same price, with bluetooth, speakers etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrera

customer_reviews.title: I'm not an audiophile but it sounds good to me.
customer_reviews.text: For someone who grew up mainly in the Cd age, I didn't have high expectations for this record player. Once I'd linked up to my Bluetooth soundbar (very easy.) I was astounded by the sound quality from the Ion air. It looks as good as it sounds too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Stuart  A Low

customer_reviews.title: what do you expect for the price?!
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. After a bit of a struggle it pairs with BOSE speakers over the Bluetooth connection, and sounds reasonable. Listening through the headphones is an uncomfortable experience as there is too much hum from the pre-amp. The controls are flimsy and the autostop has a nasty habit of stopping before the end of the record (particularly on 45s) so it has to be disengaged - to be fair the instructions do draw this to your attention. The cartridge is cheap and cheerful. In short hi fi it is not, but at the price what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and it looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it looks awesome, pairs nicely with bluetooth speakers and records to MP3 like it says. Had to buy another one for my dad to stop him walking away with mine! He bought crappy speakers so if you don't get a good set of bluetooth speakers you won't be able to enjoy it. Only weird thing was that you can hear the record ever so slightly when the needle is on the vinyl. Also once when converting a vinyl to MP3 the software may have crashed my laptop. Since then removed the software and will wait till I've finished my important work before re-installing and converting more records.
customer_reviews.author: TheFif

customer_reviews.title: Sounds terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother, save your money and get something of better sound quality. I have two different Bluetooth speakers and it would only connect to one of them. As some of the reviews have said, connecting via Bluetooth is painful as it doesn't always work and when it does it takes ages. I did manage to connect to my TV soundbar which normally sounds great, but there's just no depth to the sound. Will be sending mine back and putting in some more cash to get something worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, not too badly executed but has a fatal flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an upgrade for my daughters “briefcase” record player. Returned it the next day. Pros: looks the part; bluetooth easy to set up with Bose speaker. Cons: cheap, plasticky transport (seems generic to everything in this price bracket). HOWEVER, the showstopper is that the concept of a Bluetooth vinyl player doesn’t really work. The vinyl is acoustically audible at the player and the Bluetooth sound reproduction lags, meaning that you have a constant background noise of your music playing out of sync with what’s coming from your speaker. Maybe OK if your speaker is in another room but needs wired speakers if you are going to listen anywhere near the deck itself.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Torkington

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent record deck. So easy to install and sounds brilliant played through the soundbar. great value
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: AVOID
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this product at all costs, very poor quality. All my records skip and jump when playing making them totally unplayable. Currently being boxed up to be returned. Currently looking for an alternative record player
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking machine but did not work from day one. Bad instructions for troubleshooting too. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu1234

customer_reviews.title: Good turntable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quailty turntable easy to setup and sounds good just got one issue ,you can here the needle on the records in the back ground but you can eliminate this by putting the turntable cover down
customer_reviews.author: philip dowling

customer_reviews.title: It works but needle arm has no balance and wireless ...
customer_reviews.text: It works but needle arm has no balance and wireless connection range very limited wanted it on the sideboard at the dining room end but on window sill next to TV soundbar. Sound quality is ok.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: BE WARY IF YOU HAVE A LG SOUND BAR AS THIS TURNTABLE DOESn'T WORK WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: margy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but of poor quality. Sound is very tinny and there is a constant humm (perhaps from the power supply) on the audio output, meaning that anything very quiet is not enjoyable to listen to and anything loud is distorted. Would be perhaps acceptable as a very cheap deck but not for almost £90. Great as an ornament but not great to actually listen to records on.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kirstie S Walters

customer_reviews.title: It works well and is good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my record mad son in law. It works well and is good value
customer_reviews.author: Kate Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Missing alimentation câble in the box
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed because I just gave this as a present and after opening we realized the alimentation câble is missing... Very pretty though...
customer_reviews.author: Sara BD

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Plugged it in, held the blue-tooth button down and 1 minute later 'The Boss' is rocking the house. Even more satisfying was my my 16 year old daughter yelling "Turn that down!"... pretty sure that script is the wrong way round. I'm having a lovely afternoon now, that is almost in sepia with the warm crackle to a 33 (and a third) rpm LPs... anyone know where I can get a Party 7???
customer_reviews.author: John Begley

customer_reviews.title: poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: very poor sound quality. A lot of background noise on records. Guess I was asking for too much based on the price. Returned the item and spent additional £200 on a way way superior turntable
customer_reviews.author: Bennyboy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got it yesterday. Connection to the Bluetooth speaker very easy. Please note the player itself has no speaker of it's own. So either Bluetooth or have to be connected to another speaker with audio jack ( supplied) . Also get the cd to transfer your vinyls on to computer. USB connection supplied. Very pleased. Loved the wooden finish. Enjoying the old classics now.
customer_reviews.author: Ambar Basu

customer_reviews.title: Just one feature missing
customer_reviews.text: been a long time since I've owned a record player - this one thankfully the cover fully encloses the record unlike my previous elcheapo deck, the only feature I find I would have liked is auto return on the stylus arm - on this turntable the arm reaches the end of the record and the deck will stop spinning and the stylus arm stays resting on the record. getting the the player to connect with my speaker took some time (as they say in the instructions) but once connected it works fine and sounds good
customer_reviews.author: ManicMyna

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking piece of kit and great quality. However
customer_reviews.text: Lovely looking piece of kit and great quality. However, It has proven impossible to pair with ant Bluetooth speaker and should go back after Christmas to be replaced. Disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: we have only just started using the turntable & the ...
customer_reviews.text: we have only just started using the turntable & the turntable is running unlevel causing the needle to jump across records. can you send me a replacement. regards a foster
